source.99c30eb3:
def sort_df_by_criminal_cases(df):
    return df.sort_values(by='Criminal Cases', ascending=False)

df_2014 = sort_df_by_criminal_cases(df_2014)
df_2019 = sort_df_by_criminal_cases(df_2019)
